Class LibraryStrategy

java.lang.Object
UniversitySimulator.model.LibraryStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
CampusStrategy
public class LibraryStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements CampusStrategy
This is the LibraryStrategy class. It will be called when the student goes to the library
